description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non-material amendment in connection with the planning permission (DC/16/098761) dated 8 May 2017, in order to allow:- design amendments to the balcony balustrades on Block B at Kent Wharf, 24A Creekside SE8. Application for Non-Material Amendment to planning application ref: DC/16/098761 dated 08 May 2017 for: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a minor material amendment in connection with the planning permission (DC/14/89953) dated 17 June 2015 for the mixed use development at Kent Wharf and 24a Creekside SE8 comprising the construction of three buildings ranging from 6 to 16 storeys incorporating balconies and terraces comprising 1,375 sq.m of commercial floor space (use classes B1/D1/D2), 143 residential units (Use Class C3) public and private amenity space, together with associated landscaping, refuse stores, 184 cycle paces, 3 car parking spaces, associated highway works and plant. In order to allow: Revisions to landscaping; Relocation of roof top amenity space and living roofs across, Blocks A and C, and provision of roof extension for stair core and lift access to Block C; and Provision of 70 sqm residents' gym at ground floor to Block B; non-material design amendments to alter balcony balustrades on Block B at  Kent Wharf, 24A Creekside SE8.
